title: Champ select freezing ALOT.
body:
I've lost quite a bit of lp due to champ select freezing and it not allowing me to pick or ban. I have tried to fix the client but it works for about 2 months and then returns again. Any help on solving this annoying bug?
:(

replies.body:
Freezing in champ select usually occurs when your client is experiencing drops in its connection to our servers. Since your local network configuration is the easiest thing to check, I recommend working through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any noticeable change.
